title: CCC Template Manifest
description: Defines a Linear template in code with symbolic label references instead of raw UUIDs. Used by template-sync and template-validate commands.

name.description: Template display name as shown in Linear UI

description.description: Short description shown in template picker

linearId.description: Linear template UUID. Populated after first sync. Null for new templates not yet synced.

templateData.description: Template default values. Uses symbolic names for labels, states, and teams instead of UUIDs.

labels.description: Symbolic label names (e.g., 'type:feature', 'spec:draft'). Resolved to UUIDs at sync time via list_issue_labels.

state.description: Symbolic state name (e.g., 'Backlog', 'Todo'). Resolved to UUID at sync time via list_issue_statuses.

team.description: Symbolic team name (e.g., 'Claudian'). Null for workspace-level templates. Resolved to UUID at sync time.

assignee.description: Symbolic assignee (email, name, or 'me'). Resolved to UUID at sync time.

descriptionData.description: ProseMirror document structure for the template body. Stored as-is (no symbolic resolution needed).

projectTemplateData.description: Additional fields specific to project templates.

leadId.description: Symbolic lead (email, name, or 'me'). Resolved at sync time.

statusId.description: Symbolic project status name. Resolved at sync time.

teamIds.description: Symbolic team names. Resolved to UUIDs at sync time.

labelIds.description: Symbolic label names for project-level labels.

initialIssues.description: Issues to create when project is created from template.

variants.description: Project-scoped variants of this template. Each variant specifies a target project and templateData overrides. Unoverridden fields inherit from the base templateData.

name.description: Variant display name, e.g., 'Feature (CCC)'. Used for selection and reporting.

project.description: Symbolic project name (e.g., 'Claude Command Centre (CCC)'). Resolved to projectId UUID at sync time via list_projects.

overrides.description: templateData field overrides. Scalars replace base values. Labels support prefix operators: '+label' (additive), '-label' (removal), or plain array (full replacement). descriptionData is fully replaced if present (no deep merge). Fields not specified here inherit from the base templateData.

labels.description: Label overrides. Prefix '+' to add to base labels, '-' to remove from base labels, or provide a full array to replace.

delegateId.description: Symbolic agent name (e.g., 'Claude'). Resolved to agent user UUID at sync time.

descriptionData.description: Full replacement of base descriptionData (no deep merge)
